``abs``
=======

The ``abs`` filter returns the absolute value.

<<<<<<< HEAD
.. code-block:: jinja
=======
.. code-block:: twig
>>>>>>> 5784ff225e0936923e865fd418aab2eda72985f9

    {# number = -5 #}

    {{ number|abs }}

    {# outputs 5 #}

.. note::

    Internally, Twig uses the PHP `abs`_ function.
